modmenu.descriptionTranslation.towsclien: Client mod for the Tales of Wayward Stars adventure experience.
modmenu.summaryTranslation.towsclient: Client mod for the Tales of Wayward Stars adventure experience.
text.config.towsconfig.title: Tales of Wayward Stars Client Config
text.config.towsconfig.option.enabled.to:
Whether TOWSClient should be enabled
Changing this will require a relog
text.config.towsconfig.option.serverIP.t:
Server IP address to be ran on
Use '*' for wildcards/subdomains
text.config.towsconfig.option.enableLoca:
Whether TOWSClient should be enabled on local worlds
Useful for playing privately
